about_the_game:
Does your fantasy RPG need a city thriving on the sands? The Desert Kingdom tileset can help! Build a shining city, a modest village, and a colorful palace.

The Desert Kingdom Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Water
grass
dirt
cobble path
gray tile path
teal and orange tile path
blue and orange mosaic path
two styles of decorative tile
two styles of tables in cream, teal and orange
brick edge
scroll edge
plus grass, hole, rock and more

Walls/roofs:

Walls to match floors, plus autotile windows with various types of lighting and decorative alcove.

Also includes:

Stairs to match floors
Variety of doors (with animations that have various backgrounds)
4 styles of arches (with damaged version)
5 styles of pillar (with damaged version)
Round building base with domes (with damaged version)
Various windows with lit/unlit versions, with curtains
Cracks and holes to damage walls
Trees and bushes
Oasis in various sizes
Well (with/without visible bucket)
Fancy bed in three sizes
Alcoves that match bedding
Curtains and sashes
Throne
Floor rugs and medallions
Set of chairs
Lamps and lanterns
Various decorative objects
Decorated tables
Mannequins
Simple beds
Broken/scattered objects
Market tiles – canopies (new and ruined), tables filled with goods for sale, rugs
Tent (new and ruined)
and more!

Events and Animations

Door animations
Flying carpet

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
